# Class RemoteKnowledgeComponent

Remote knowledge component for knowledge base services. This component provides access to external knowledge storage and retrieval services, handling document parsing, chunking, and embedding for semantic search.

#### Example


```
const knowledgeComponent = new RemoteKnowledgeComponent(&#123;  id: 'my-knowledge-component',  maxCharsPerChunk: 1500,  maxChunksPerDocument: 20&#125;);

```
